entry.def: If you say that something or someone is familiarly known as a particular thing or familiarly called a particular thing, you are giving the name that people use informally to refer to it.

example.tran: 安·汉密尔顿的父亲，昵称为“丁克”

sentences.sentence: "Sid, as he was familiarly known by his friends, was one of the most respected and devoted members of the socialist minority group"
